rootCause: Recent edits reintroduced spaces inside the {{sugarkube_cli}} placeholders for docs, nvme-health, start-here, and token-place recipes. The spacing meant the regression guards could not find the CLI invocation, so pytest flagged the recipes as missing the unified wrapper.
resolution: Normalized every recipe that shells out to the sugarkube CLI to use the "{{sugarkube_cli}}" pattern again so the guards recognise the delegated commands.
